FuncDef: This command configures DHCPv4 options via LUDB that are passed in all DHCP messages to the client. The options are blindly appended to any options already present in the DHCP message. In other words, there is no intelligent merging of the options where overlapping options from different sources are further evaluated to determine whether only one option or multiple options should be returned to the client.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies up to four option numbers. This can be a well-known or a an anonymous option.
Specifies an IPv4 address as an option.
Specifies options coded as Hex characters.
Specifies options coded as an ASCII string.
